summary: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

Lee|Jonathan Pienaar|Sonni Chidiebere|Nnamdi Onyeiwu|Nhlanhla Mavimbela|Mfundo Pisani|Phado Bahola|Thabang Mothle|Buhle Seya|Sizwe Makapela|Tyrone Keogh|Winston Ntshona|Mduduzi Mabaso|Nathaniel Ramabulana|Zenzo Ngqobe|Mlungisi Hlophe|Carol Behane|Nigel Harman|Clare Holman|Kedibone Tholo Manyaka|Koketso Mojela|Keithian Santos-Sammons|Irmelin DiCaprio|Ray Donn|Julie Eagleton|Karen Haacke|Vanessa Haywood|Dan Hirst|Cordell McQueen|Scott Wickes
title: Diamante de sangre
